reviewText: Note - This DVD is in German, and doesn't have English subtitles. But it does have a rare example of Count von Luckner's speaking voice, from the TV show "This is Your Life". This is almost impossible to find, which is why I bought the DVD. As a von Luckner admirer, I can appreciate the various film footage about the Count, even though I didn't understand the dialog. Be advised that you will need to make your DVD player "region free" to watch this. This can be easily done, just google it.
